title: Asch tendency of group to conform reduced by what

content.question: In the experiments on conformity, the tendency of group members to conform was reduced most by which of the following factors?

choices.label: The presence of a single dissenter
Frequent interaction among the group members

content.answer: The presence of a single dissenter

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
